00028 class TTSymbol : public TTElement {
00029 private:
00030         TTString                                string;                         
00031         TTUInt32                                id;                                     
00032         static TTSymbol**               symbolTable;            
00033         static TTUInt32                 symbolTableSize;        
00034 
00035 public:
00036         TTSymbol(TTString newString);
00037         virtual ~TTSymbol();
00038         
00040         TTSymbol(const TTSymbol& oldSymbol);
00041 
00042         const TTString                  getString();
00043         const TTUInt32                  getId();
00044         TTBoolean                               compare(TTSymbol& anotherSymbol);
00045         
00046         // make sure this is a friend so that it can access the private members of the other atom
00047         friend bool operator == (const TTSymbol& symbol1, const TTSymbol& symbol2)
00048         {
00049                 if(symbol1.id == symbol2.id)
00050                         return true;
00051                 else
00052                         return false;
00053         }
00054 
00055         //friend bool operator == (const TTValue& a1, const TTValue& a2);
00056 
00059         static const TTSymbol*  lookup(const TTString string);
00060 };
